title: 3 and Out - Cowboys Smack Philly, Big Belichick Problems, Blow Up the Giants, Big Ben's Toast, USC Rebuild Reality, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Cowboys Smack Philly, Big Belichick Problems, Blow Up the Giants, Big Ben's Toast, USC Rebuild Reality, Mailbag
description:
John breaks down the Cowboys impressive home beatdown of the Eagles on MNF. and how a weak NFC East will play out. He also looks at why Bill Belichick and the Pats could be in big trouble, makes the case for blowing up the Giants, explains why it's completely over for Big Ben, why Cooper Kupp's path to stardom is what the NFL is all about, why there won't be an immediate USC turnaround regardless of who they hire, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
